title: Mathematics Definitions
definition: The word mathematics is derived from the Greek word mathematikos, which means 'inclined to learn.' Literally speaking, to be mathematical is to be curious, open-minded, and interested in always learning more!
perspectives: As the sum of its branches
As a way to model the world

misconceptions.title: Math requires a Special Brain
misconceptions.reality: Mathematics is accessible to anyone willing to learn

misconceptions.title: The Math in Modern Issues Is too complex
misconceptions.reality: Basic quantitative reasoning helps understand complex issues

misconceptions.title: Math Makes you Less Sensitive
misconceptions.reality: Math enhances logical thinking without reducing empathy

misconceptions.title: Math Makes no allowance for creativity
Math Provides exact answers
misconceptions.reality: Many mathematical models provide approximate answers

misconceptions.title: Math Is Irrelevant to My Life
misconceptions.reality: Math is used in daily life, arts, culture, and all professions
